title: Purpose for Nonstackable Slows
body:
What was the goal for removing the stacks of slows? Why is it that a skill like Talon's blink that is a 99% slow for .25 seconds override Nunu's Ice Blast that lasts for 3 seconds?  All it does from my viewpoint is to make champions with hard CC a higher priority pick more than ever. 

Was this change necessary? Why was it needed?
